name: Armed to the Gears
description: Get ready for a lot of destruction and action-strategy as you control a fully armed Mech through cyberpunk cities, military bases and industrial areas, capturing and defending territories. Build turrets and structures, collect resources and advance the attack against powerful enemies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Onboard GPU DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 320 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 320 MB available space
